description: TanDEM-X (TDX) is an interferometric SAR satellite mission, funded in a public/private collaboration  between the German Aerospace Centre (DLR) and Airbus Defence and Space (formerly EADS Astrium GmbH). The satellite  launched in June, 2010 and constructs three-dimensional images of Earth's surface.
